resources.string: Content update failed.\n\nPlease re-insert USB flash drive and do not remove until update is completed.
Please insert SD card, and then re-insert USB flash drive.
Copy completed.\n\nPlease remove your USB flash drive.
Security check failed. No contents were updated.
SD card is inserted. Start play media files.
U-Disk is inserted. Start copy media files.
U-Disk is removed. Start play media files.
